for_sales.sales_text: Abigail is a 1996 Gaff Sloop trailer sailer in excellent condition. Thoroughly overhauled over 2022/2023 including brand new mast, rigging, engine, trailer, tiller, swimming ladder, boom cover and winter cover. All spars freshly re-vanished. Ready to launch polished and antifouled. Traditional heavyweight, steady under sail. Similar to the Cornish Shrimper but having a enormous safe cockpit for a family and much more headroom and space below. 3 births with two ring spirit burner and sink plus cupboard to house a compost heads. Tax/VAT status Paid/Included Outboard engine Tohatsu MFS6D 2023 6hp

boat.full_description:
1996 Gaff Sloop Trailer-Sailer.

Designed by David Cannell producing a weekender with the benefits of a large cockpit and a spacious cabin with excellent headroom. As a trailer sailer one can explore anything from lochs in Scotland to hidden creeks in Cornwall. Or just enjoy coastal hopping around the Solent.
boat.name: Abigail
